column14: Source states: 'Since 1 January 2025 and as of 17 March 2025, 22 cases have been reported' - interpreted as sCh cases from official ECDC surveillance

processing_notes: Source states: '546 total cases' and '19 total deaths' by February 21, 2014 - interpreted as sCh cases and deaths with calculated CFR
Source states: 'More than 250 cases' and 'more than seven deaths' - interpreted as minimum sCh cases and deaths from first recorded outbreak
Source states: '4 pupils' affected with '1 confirmed case' after food contamination - interpreted as 4 suspected cases, 1 confirmed case
Source states: '32 cases with 2 fatalities' in Katutura area - interpreted as sCh cases and deaths with 6.3% CFR calculated
Source states: '138 cases' and '7 deaths' in Kunene region with '5% case fatality rate' - interpreted as sCh cases and deaths
Source states: '55-year-old woman' confirmed case from 'Kunene Region' - interpreted as 1 confirmed cholera case marking return after decade
Source states: '72 suspected cases' and '4 confirmed cases' during flooding emergency in Engela Health District - interpreted as sCh and cCh cases from health district outbreak
Source validates: 'Zero cholera transmission reported in Namibia 2015-2024' with active surveillance confirmation - interpreted as validated absence period with zero cases and deaths
